data.oai_dc:dc: 3-D movie reconstruction of pyrenoid ultrastructure showing connections (stalks) to the cell cytoplasm and chloroplast lobes. Data were obtained from serial block face scanning electron microscopy on preserved cells of Symbiodinium glynnii sp. nov. Detailed protocol concerning the chemical fixation and preparation of specimens for serial block face scanning electron microscopy available at Deerinck TJ, Bushong EA, Thor A, and Ellisman EH (2010). NCMIR Methods for 3D EM: A New Protocol for Preparation of Biological Specimens for Serial Blockface Scanning Electron Microscopy. SBEM Protocol version 7_01_10. Center for Research in Biological Systems and the National Center for Microscopy and Imaging Research, University of California, San Diego, La Jolla, CA. https://ncmir.ucsd.edu/sbem-protocol
